com.honeywell.mobility.print

Class PrinterException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.honeywell.mobility.print.PrinterException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LabelPrinterException, LinePrinterException

    public class PrinterException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception thrown by the Printer class.
    Since:
    1.30
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • ERROR_NO_CONNECTION

        public static final int ERROR_NO_CONNECTION
        The printer is not connected. This error usually occurs when a method is called to operate on the printer without first calling the connect() method.

      • ERROR_ALREADY_CONNECTED

        public static final int ERROR_ALREADY_CONNECTED
        An active printer connection already exists.
